ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
285201006Hospital environment (environment)
264362003Home (environment)
257585005Clinic (environment)

description.value: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values that contains terms that indicate the surroundings the individual was in during the measurement (i.e. home, clinic, hospital, etc.).
